php.java.script.servlet
Class ServletReader

java.lang.Object
  java.io.Reader
      php.java.script.servlet.ServletReader
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Closeable, java.lang.Readable, IScriptReader
public class ServletReader
extends java.io.Reader
implements IScriptReader

This class is similar to the URLReader, except that it connects to the FastCGIServlet directly using dispatcher.include(); the request is not routed through the servlet pool.

This class can only be used to execute a simple PHP script, for PHP method invocation the URLReader must be used instead.

Author:
jostb
